body:
Reason why i define the rape in this particular doujin as debauchery should be blatant by the introduction of Free mage or Free fighter and the very next page they aint free at all.
Not just pervy wouldnt you agree?

Last doujinka i recall using romanized western letters to id series and pin ups like that was great Pepsitou.
Glad to see DpC also thinks of non fans when drawing his girls.
Not evryone is a gamer or otaku so thanks a bunch.
Thats why i love you dude no matter how much debauched rape you put in your vast work.
Though i hate to admit that Grassen 1-4 shit was overkill even for a war.
Anything reminiscent of what Japs did to comfort women in ManChina is never welcome.
